response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value for you at $15,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored specifically for you, aiming to provide you with the best value while ensuring my business gains are also considered. I believe this price reflects the true worth of the product while leaving room for negotiation if needed. Please let me know your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
